A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don't listen to the few whinging fan-boys! It's a good movie...much better than any of the prequels\, and much more in line with the original series in quality of storytelling. Like Episode 5 (Empire)\, it's a transitional movie. It stands well on its own in many ways\, and I sense that it will fit well into the larger picture. There are smart\, broad themes about the nature of heroism. Great acting\, great effects\, and overall the high quality in production and script that one would hope for in a Star Wars movie.
